parts.text:
```json
{
"WRF-Chem": "This script is designed to run a real-time WRF-Chem simulation, including data preparation, assimilation, and post-processing.",
"Software": [
"WPS (Weather Research and Forecasting Preprocessing System)",
"WRFDA (WRF Data Assimilation)",
"WRF (Weather Research and Forecasting Model)",
"WRFCHEM (WRF Chemistry)",
"DART (Data Assimilation Research Testbed)"
],
"Resource Requirements": {
"Compute": {
"Project Numbers": [
"NACD0002",
"P19010000"
],
"Job Class": "geyser",
"Time Limits": {
"GEOGRID": "0:10",
"WRFCHEM": "6:00 or 2:59",
"WRFDA": "0:10",
"FILTER": "4:59",
"MISC": "0:02"
},
"Tasks": {
"GEOGRID": {
"Total": 32,
"Per Node": 8
},
"WRFCHEM": {
"Total": 32,
"Per Node": 8
},
"WRFDA": {
"Total": 32,
"Per Node": 8
},
"FILTER": {
"Total": 32,
"Per Node": 8
},
"MISC": {
"Total": 1,
"Per Node": 8
}
}
},
"Data": {
"Scratch Directory": "/glade/scratch/mizzi",
"Work Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi",
"ACD Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi",
"FRAPPE Directory": "/glade/p/FRAPPE",
"Experiment Data Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA",
"Run Directory": "/glade/scratch/mizzi/real_2008CASE_CPSR_VARLOC",
"TRUNK Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK",
"WPS Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/WPSv3.6.1_dmpar",
"WPS GEOG Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/WPSv3.6.1_GEOG_DATA/geog",
"WRFCHEM Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/WRFCHEMv3.6.1_dmpar",
"WRFCHEM GABI Directory": "/glade/p/FRAPPE/FRAPPE_TRUNK/WRFCHEMv3.6.1_dmpar_GABI_REV1.0",
"WRFDA Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/WRFDAv3.4_dmpar",
"DART Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/DART_CHEM_REPOSITORY",
"BUILD Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/WRFDAv3.4_dmpar/var/da",
"WRF Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/WRFv3.6.1_dmpar",
"HYBRID SCRIPTS Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/DART_CHEM_REPOSITORY/models/wrf_chem/hybrid_scripts",
"ADJUST EMISS Directory": "/glade/p/work/mizzi/TRUNK/DART_CHEM_REPOSITORY/models/wrf_chem/run_scripts/RUN_EMISS_INV",
"MOZBC Data Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/mozart_forecasts",
"Experiment Static Files Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/static_files",
"Experiment WRFCHEMI Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/anthro_emissions",
"Experiment WRFFIRECHEMI Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/fire_emissions",
"Experiment WRFBIOCHEMI Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/bio_emissions",
"Experiment COLDENS Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/wes_coldens",
"Experiment PREPBUFR Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/met_obs_prep_data",
"Experiment MOPITT CO Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/mopitt_co_hdf_data",
"Experiment IASI CO Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/iasi_co_hdf_data",

"Experiment MODIS AOD Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/modis_aod_hdf_data",

"Experiment HIST IO Directory": "/glade/p/acd/mizzi/2008CASE_REAL_TIME_DATA/hist_io_files",

}
}
```
